subject: Order #SSN2683 Potier Nathéo
description_text:
Hello, can you cancel the order I don't need it after all.
Order #SSN2683 Potier Nathéo

conversations.body_text: Hi Natheo,      Okay, we will cancel it for you. May I ask why you wish to cancel?

the shipping costs are way too expensive for the product I saw it elsewhere
with free shipping

Le ven. 19 sept. 2025, 03:54, service@simsonn.com
Hi Natheo P,    We can refund the price difference for you. Please let me know where you found a lower price than our official website.

Thanks for the suggestion, but I don't know if the product would suit me, I
have the simsonn plus X and I find the red elastomer much too rigid, I
replaced it with one of the springs provided, the blue one, and I found
that it was already better, but still a little too hard. I try to make the
pedals as realistic as the cars I drove.

Le mar. 23 sept. 2025 à 11:58, service@simsonn.com
​  You may find this video helpful.

Thanks for the video but I prefer a refund I think I will continue to use
the spring

Le mer. 24 sept. 2025 à 11:00, service@simsonn.com
好的，我们已经处理了您的退款。
